summary:
**Breaking Bad Summary:**

"Breaking Bad" is a popular TV show about a high school chemistry teacher, Walter White (played by Bryan Cranston), who gets lung cancer. To provide for his family, he starts making and selling methamphetamine with a former student, Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul). The series follows their dangerous journey in the criminal world. It aired from 2008 to 2013 and received high praise for its story, acting, and characters. The show won many awards and is considered one of the best TV series ever. It led to a prequel series, "Better Call Saul," and a sequel movie, "El Camino."
title: Breaking Bad
